name: devai
description: A CLI tool for AI-powered code editing using Gemini API

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run update-version && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'Release version $(npm pkg get version --workspaces=false | tr -d ",")'
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run update-version && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'Release version $(npm pkg get version --workspaces=false | tr -d ",")'
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run update-version && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'Release version $(npm pkg get version --workspaces=false | tr -d ",")'
scripts.release: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'Build for release' && git push && git push --tags
